purpose: The email informs recipients about the extended submission deadline for JOWO workshops to June 14th, 2025.
evidence_sentences: The submission deadline of all JOWO workshops has been extended to June 14th, 2025, which means you still have roughly two weeks to finish that report, idea, result, vision, or model that you have been working on.

JOWO Workshops

* Workshop paper submission deadline: 25 May 2025 1 June 14 June 2025*
